title: ECommerce App
description: A robust eCommerce platform built with Flutter and Firebase.
details: This project involved developing a responsive and scalable eCommerce application with features like product listing, search, and cart management. It also includes an admin panel for managing products.

title: Inventory Management System
description: A Node.js and PostgreSQL system for inventory management.
details: This project enables users to efficiently manage inventory with CRUD operations, reporting, and analytics. Built using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

title: Flappy Bird Clone
description: A fun and engaging game inspired by the classic Flappy Bird. Navigate through pipes, avoid obstacles, and achieve the highest score!
